headline: Halliburton to Optimize Remaining Potential of the UK North Sea in Collaboration With Repsol Resources UK
summary: ABERDEEN, Scotland, June 09, 2025--Repsol Resources UK (OTC: REPYF) awarded Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) a 5-year contract to support the full well lifecycle on their platform assets in the UK North Sea.
